faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get insights about the AI Face Swap feature

items.title: What types of images work best for face swapping?
items.description: Clear and well-lit photos with frontal faces yield the best results. Avoid obstructions and ensure faces are not too far from the camera.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many face swaps I can do?
items.description: Users receive 30 free credits per day for face swaps, with additional credits available through participation in surveys and challenges.

items.title: Can I use swapped images for social media or commercial projects?
items.description: Paid users can freely use their images for both personal and commercial purposes. Free-tier users can share on social media but must refrain from commercial use.

items.title: How is my privacy protected during the face swap?
items.description: All processing is done in your browser with no uploads required, ensuring complete privacy for your images.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the difference for yourself. No sign-up required.
